Searching_Victim1_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>AHHH!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>Now that's refreshin'! Never in my life
have I been so grateful for splash fruit!<sp:0:4:0>I think that now... <sp:5:1:0>Yep! Yep! My limbs
work again! I'd better go and meet up
with my friends, eh?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Thanks for the save, pal!
Talk_Ready_11_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We got separated from three of our
friends on the road in Gerudo Canyon.<sp:0:4:0>One of them has come back, but the other
two are still out there somewhere.<sp:0:4:0>The longer they're gone, the more worried
I get. What if they're lost? Or hurt?
Searching_Victim1_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>No worries, pal... Ugh... There's not a
river nearby, is there?
Rescued_Victim3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've gotta thank you for your help back
in the canyon. That spicy pepper warmed
my heart and my everything else!
I owe you one, really. I'll never forget
what you did for me.
Talk_Report_01_Client_Unknown_00: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Oh my! You wouldn't happen to be...<sp:5:1:0>
Rescued_Victim3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I promise, if I ever see a traveler in need,
I'll help them like you helped me.
Talk_Report_01_Client_Unknown_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I lost sight of my friends during our
travels, but thanks to you, all three of
them have made it back safely!
Thank you, truly. This is a token of my
appreciation. Please take it!
Talk_Report_01_Client_Unknown_02:
<snd:SurpriseS_00>Oooh! I recognize you! You're the traveler
who rescued everyone, aren't you?
Rescued_Victim3_aboutVictim1_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Which reminds me...old Giro and our
bodyguard Botrick still haven't come
back. They might be in trouble.
Giro was grousing an awful lot about
the heat. Maybe he went to cool off by
the river?
And Botrick scares so easily, I wouldn't
be surprised if he skittered into a cave at
the first sign of a monster.
I hope they're OK.
Talk_Report_01_Client_RePresent_00: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Did you make some space in your pouch?
Talk_Step_Common_Assistant_Day:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't need to tell you how sweltering
Gerudo Canyon can get.<sp:0:4:0>I'm sure they're just resting in a nice, cool
cave along the road somewhere. They'll
come back. You'll see.
Talk_Report_01_Client_RePresent_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700>There you are. Quince is waiting for you.
Rescued_Victim1_Noon:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Hey there! I was hopin' I'd see you again
sooner or later.
Rescued_Victim2_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, it's you from before! It's so dark,
I almost didn't recognize you.
Talk_Report_01_Client_RePresent_02:
<snd:LaughS_00>Here you go, then! A little thank-you for
helping out my friends.
Talk_Step_00_Client_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_01>I understand your concern, Quince.<sp:5:1:0>
Really I do.

But what if we went searching for them
and they came back while we were gone?
They'd think we abandoned them.
Best for us to be patient and wait here.
As difficult as that might be.
Talk_Step_Common_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think>If you're heading to Gerudo Canyon, then
all I can say is be careful.
Rescued_Victim2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I owe you an apology for having to save a
professional bodyguard from monsters.<sp:0:4:0>You haven't mentioned that to the
others, have you? I wouldn't want them
rethinking their decision to hire me.
Rescued_Victim2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If my friends ask, say I was looking out for
them like a real bodyguard. Oh, and that I
looked cool fighting the monsters!
Talk_Step_10_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Two of our friends still haven't come back.<sp:5:1:0>
It's horrible just standing here, not
knowing if they're all right.
Talk_Report_00_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All three of our friends came back! That
was your doing, wasn't it?<sp:0:4:0>Thank you very, very, very much. Here's a
little something for you. Don't be modest!
You deserve it!
Rescued_Victim2_Noon:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, it's you from before! You look busy,
so I won't take up too much of your time.
Talk_Ready_03_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Nenea and I lost sight of three of our
friends on the road in Gerudo Canyon.<sp:0:4:0>We had agreed to meet here if we got
separated, but there's still no sign
of them.
The longer they're gone, the more worried
I get. What if they're lost? Or hurt?
Rescued_Victim2_aboutVictim1_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>On that note...it's odd that Giro and Garill
still haven't come back.<sp:0:4:0>Giro has a real weakness for fish.
I wouldn't be surprised if he headed
toward the river.
As for Garill, he's an energetic guy and
likes to admire the scenery. He might've
raced down the path to get a good view.<sp:0:4:0>I'd search for them myself, but I'm still a
little shaken up...
Searching_Victim3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ugh... <sp:5:1:0>Can you help me?<sp:0:4:0>I was traveling through here with my
friends, but I got too excited and split off
from the group.
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Before I could find them, night fell and
the chill set in... I got so cold, my joints
froze up.
<sp:5:1:0>I can hardly move, let alone walk all the
way to where my friends are.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I think a <clr:0000>spicy pepper <clr:ffff>is just about the
only thing that'll warm me up...
Talk_Ready_21_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We got separated from three of our
friends on the road in Gerudo Canyon.<sp:0:4:0>Two of them have come back, but the
other one is still out there somewhere.<sp:0:4:0>The more time passes, the more worried
I get. What if something happened?
Searching_Victim3_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Not even one?<sp:0:4:0>Uh, that's OK... I just wish I'd thought to
bring some <clr:0000>spicy pepper<clr:ffff>. Then I could
cook one to warm me up.
Talk_Report_01_Client_MaxPouch:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Hm. <sp:5:1:0>I wanted to give you these 10 bomb
flowers, but it looks like there's no room
in your pouch.
Why don't you make some space and
come back? I'll be here!
Rescued_Victim1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You're the only reason I made it outta
Gerudo Canyon alive.<sp:0:4:0>I thank my lucky stars for you and that
refreshing splash fruit.<sp:0:4:0>Really, ya saved my skin!
Rescued_Victim1_aboutVictim2_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I see Botrick and Garill still haven't
come back.<sp:0:4:0>Botrick may be a bodyguard by vocation,
but he's a timid sort. I betcha he's hidin'
out in a cave somewhere.
As for Garill, he's a romantic at heart.
He might have gone someplace high up to
get a good view of the canyon.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Then again, Garill's a seasoned traveler.
He would have known not to stray from
the road.
Anyway, I worry for both of those guys.
Rescued_Victim2_Morning:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Hey, it's you from before! Have you been
walking around all morning?
Rescued_Victim2_aboutVictim1:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>On that note...it's odd that Giro still
hasn't come back.<sp:0:4:0>The man has a real weakness for fish.
I wouldn't be surprised if he headed
toward the river.<sp:0:4:0>I'd search for him myself, but I'm still a
little shaken up about those monsters...
Searching_Victim3_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ah, how kind of you! You're warming
my heart.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>Now to warm the rest of me! Let's cook!
Rescued_Victim1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think>If I ever go back to Gerudo Canyon, I'll
make sure to fill up my satchel with plenty
of splash fruit.
I tell ya, I got so thirsty back there, I just
about started drinkin' sand.
Rescued_Victim1_aboutVictim2:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I see my friend Botrick still hasn't
come back.<sp:0:4:0>Botrick may be a bodyguard by vocation,
but he's a timid sort. I betcha he's hidin'
out in a cave somewhere.
Poor guy... I'm worried for him.
Searching_Victim3_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Hey, you're back.<sp:0:4:0>I'm still stuck here... Since that night out
in the cold, I can hardly turn my neck,
let alone get up and walk.
I think a <clr:0000>spicy pepper <clr:ffff>is just about the
only thing that'll warm me up...
Rescued_Victim1_aboutVictim3:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I see my friend Garill still hasn't
come back.<sp:0:4:0>He's a romantic at heart, so he might
have gone someplace high up to get a
good view of the canyon.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Then again, he's a seasoned traveler.
He would have known not to stray from
the road.<sp:0:4:0>At any rate, I worry for the guy.
Rescued_Victim2_aboutVictim3:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>On that note...it's odd that Garill still
hasn't come back.<sp:0:4:0>But he's an energetic guy, and he likes to
admire the scenery. He might have raced
down the path to get a good view.<sp:0:4:0>I'd search for him myself, but I'm still a
little shaken up...
Searching_Victim3_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Mm-hmm! Loose aaand limber!<sp:0:4:0>You really saved me there. A seasoned
traveler I may be, but I guess even pros
make mistakes sometimes.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My friends must be worried sick. I'll have
to head out soon.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks for your help! I owe you one!
Rescued_Victim3_Noon:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Hey! You look well. I was just thinking
about you.
Talk_Ready_01_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>Oh...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry if I seem disappointed. I just
thought our friends might have returned.
Talk_Ready_04_Assistant_Day:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00>They're experienced travelers. I'm sure
they'll be fine.

They probably stopped to rest in a cave or
under some shade along the road, since
the canyon gets so hot during the day.
Not to say they'll travel faster at night.
It gets so cold, they might have to start
a fire to keep from freezing...<sp:0:4:0>But they'll be back in due time. We just
have to be patient.
Rescued_Victim3_aboutVictim1:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Which reminds me...old Giro still hasn't
come back. He might be in trouble.<sp:0:4:0>Giro was grousing an awful lot about
the heat. Maybe he went to cool off by
the river?<sp:0:4:0>I hope he's OK.
Rescued_Victim3_aboutVictim2:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think>Which reminds me...our bodyguard
Botrick still hasn't come back. He might
be in trouble.
He scares so easily, I wouldn't be
surprised if he skittered into a cave
at the first sign of a monster.
I hope he's OK.
Rescued_Victim3_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Hey! You're here mighty late. I was just
thinking about you.
Rescued_Victim1_Evening:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Hey there! Pretty late to be on the road,
isn't it? Anyway, I've been hopin' I'd see
you again.
Talk_Step_Common_Assistant_Night:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't need to tell you how freezing cold
Gerudo Canyon gets at night.<sp:0:4:0>I'm sure they're resting in a cave by the
road with a nice, warm fire going. They'll
come back. You'll see.
Rescued_Victim3_Midnight:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>...Mm? Oh, it's you.<sp:5:1:0> Sorry. I was dozing
off there.
Talk_Report_01_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now, it's high time for us to get back on
the road. Stay safe out there!
Searching_Victim2_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Wow, you're strong!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><sp:0:2:2:6400>Whew. You might think I'm a hopeless
coward...<sp:5:1:0>and you wouldn't be entirely
wrong. <sp:5:1:0>But I'm also a bodyguard.
I was traveling with my friends, but we got
separated. Then I saw those monsters and
I completely froze up.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>Don't tell anyone...OK?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>I'd better get going. My friends will surely
feel safer with a fearless bodyguard by
their side... <sp:5:1:0>Heh. See ya!
Talk_Step_20_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>One of our friends still hasn't come back.
Ugh... <sp:5:1:0>It's frustrating, just waiting and
hoping for a safe return.
Talk_Step_00_Client:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Three of our friends still haven't come
back. <sp:5:1:0>I'm worried. But all I can do is wait.
Rescued_Victim2_Midnight:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_00>Hmm? Wha-?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0200>I wasn't sleeping! I was closing my eyes
so I could listen for intruders!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Greeting_00>Oh...it's you from before! I thought one
of my friends might have caught me
snoozing on the job.
Searching_Victim1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Ya found me... I was sure nobody'd come
lookin' for me all the way out here...<sp:0:4:0>Got split up from my friends... Tried
looking for 'em, but then the dehydration
set in, and I couldn't move...
Ugh... I sure could go for a skosh of
<clr:0000>splash fruit<clr:ffff>...
Rescued_Victim3_Morning:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>Good morning! You're an early riser, huh?
You look well.
Searching_Victim1_01: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_00>Oooh... I could kiss ya right now. Thanks!
